text:
I write to you because I would like to ask for a scholarship. I need it to achieve my dream to live some months in Paris. It's one of my biggest goal in life but it cost too much money for a student like me. It could be really helpful to succeed in university because I chose to learn Italian. I know that the best way to learn a new language is to speak but I'm not sure to speak a lot Italian in Paris. That's why I want to study one semester in Paris. It's an opportunity to learn a lot aout the culture too. When you live abroad you learn a lot about ways of lives that are different from yours. I will discover how it is to study in university there and how is the student life.
But most of all I think it will be very useful for my future. When you live abroad you have to meet new people, to adapt yourself to their culture. I think it's the best way to go out of your confort zone and I need it to become the best version of myself. I already live one month in Paris and it was an amazing experience. It changed a lot of things for me, im more open minded and less shy now. I want to experience it again but longer this time.
Paris is such a beautiful country for me. I love everything about it. I love people behaviors, food, landscapes, fashion or even art. I know that I will love this country and it will be so exciting for me to practice my Italian and my accent.
I know that a lot of students ask scholarships and I really hope that you will pay attention to my demand.
